English.Text: Your barbarous dimwits are ignorant of local customs. "Do they tip arrows with cyanide, perhaps?" your officer snaps, wiping sweat from his reddened face, "how the devil do I know what these primitives use?!" Those who took darts wear expressions confused and melancholy as they melt into darkness, wondering perhaps the point of their sacrifice. Your expedition bury the dead as fast as they can, lest the hostile peoples of this particular territory return.
